name: Snake Game Network Workflow
description: Automates the setup and deployment of a networked Snake game.
prompt: Develop a networked version of the classic Snake game with multiplayer capabilities.

steps.title: Setup Project Structure
steps.prompt: Create a new project directory for the Snake game with necessary folders for source code, assets, and configuration files. Initialize a git repository.
steps.verify_prompt: Check if the project directory and git repository are correctly initialized. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if setup is correct.

steps.title: Implement Game Logic
steps.prompt: Write the core game logic for the Snake game including snake movement, collision detection, and food spawning in a suitable programming language.
steps.verify_prompt: Test the game logic for correct snake movement and collision detection. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if tests pass.

steps.title: Add Network Functionality
steps.prompt: Integrate networking capabilities to support multiplayer mode using sockets or a similar technology. Implement server-client communication for game state synchronization.
steps.verify_prompt: Verify that multiple clients can connect to the server and game states are synchronized. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if networking works correctly.

steps.title: Develop User Interface
steps.prompt: Create a simple graphical user interface for the Snake game using a suitable library or framework. Ensure it displays the game state and supports user input.
steps.verify_prompt: Test the UI to ensure it displays the game correctly and handles user input. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if UI functions as expected.

steps.title: Final Testing and Deployment
steps.prompt: Perform end-to-end testing of the networked Snake game with multiple players. Package the game for deployment and provide instructions for running the server and client.
steps.verify_prompt: Confirm that the game works with multiple players and deployment instructions are clear. Output <promise>PASS</promise> if final tests pass.
